mapper.insert: insert into board(boardno, board_writer, board_passwd, board_title, board_date, board_recount, board_content) values (board_seq.nextval, #{board_writer, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{board_passwd, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{board_title, jdbcType=VARCHAR},sysdate,0,#{board_content})
mapper.update: update board set board_recount=board_recount+1 where boardno=#{boardno}
mapper.select: select * from board where BOARD_PASSWD = #{board_passwd} and boardno = #{boardno}
